languages.text: {n}Вы прикрываете глаза, пытаясь {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}сосредоточиться{/d}... и в этот момент чувствуете касание чем-то острым: Кунрад каким-то потусторонним образом почувствовал движение варпа и нанес упреждающий удар.{/n}

{n}You close your eyes and try to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}focus{/d}... and then you feel the touch of something sharp — Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы прикрываете глаза, пытаясь {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}сосредоточиться{/d}... и в этот момент чувствуете касание чем-то острым: Кунрад каким-то потусторонним образом почувствовал движение варпа и нанес упреждающий удар.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to focus... before you feel the touch of something sharp. Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}
{n}You close your eyes and try to focus... and then you feel the touch of something sharp — Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}
{n}You close your eyes and try to focus... and then you feel the touch of something sharp — Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}
{n}You close your eyes and try to focus... and then you feel the touch of something sharp — Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du schließt die Augen und versuchst,. dich zu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}konzentrieren{/d} ... und dann spürst du die Berührung von etwas Scharfem – Voigtvir hat irgendwie eine Verschiebung im Warp für einen Präventivschlag genutzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}focus{/d}... and then you feel the touch of something sharp — Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du schließt die Augen und versuchst,. dich zu konzentrieren ... und dann spürst du die Berührung von etwas Scharfem – Voigtvir hat irgendwie eine Verschiebung im Warp für einen Präventivschlag genutzt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous fermez les yeux pour tenter de vous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}concentrer{/d}... et sentez alors quelque chose de tranchant vous toucher : Voigtvir a détecté un changement dans le Warp et décidé de frapper de façon préventive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}focus{/d}... and then you feel the touch of something sharp — Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous fermez les yeux pour tenter de vous concentrer... et sentez alors quelque chose de tranchant vous toucher : Voigtvir a détecté un changement dans le Warp et décidé de frapper de façon préventive.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你闭上眼睛，试图{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}集中精神{/d}……之后感觉到了尖锐的触感。不知为何，维特威尔已经感觉到了亚空间的变化，发动了先发制人的攻击。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}focus{/d}... and then you feel the touch of something sharp — Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你闭上眼睛，试图集中精神……之后感觉到了尖锐的触感。不知为何，维特威尔已经感觉到了亚空间的变化，发动了先发制人的攻击。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは目を閉じて{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}集中{/d}しようとする…しかし、なにか鋭いものが触れるのを感じる。ボイトヴィルは<歪み>の変化を感知し、先制攻撃を仕掛けてきたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}focus{/d}... and then you feel the touch of something sharp — Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目を閉じて集中しようとし…なにか鋭いものが触れるのを感じるーーボイドヴィルは<歪み>の変化を感知し、先制攻撃を仕掛けてきたのだ。{/n}
{n}あなたは目を閉じて{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}集中{/d}しようとする…しかし、なにか鋭いものが触れるのを感じる。ボイトヴィルは<歪み>の変化を感知し、先制攻撃を仕掛けてきたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cierras los ojos e intentas {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}concentrarte{/d}... luego sientes el roce de algo afilado. Voigtvir ha detectado una alteración en la disformidad y asestado un golpe preventivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}focus{/d}... and then you feel the touch of something sharp — Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cierras los ojos e intentas concentrarte... luego sientes el roce de algo afilado. Voigtvir ha detectado una alteración en la disformidad y asestado un golpe preventivo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gözlerini kapatıp {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}odaklanmaya{/d} çalışıyorsun... Ama keskin bir şeyin dokunuşunu hissediyorsun. Voigtvir, bir şekilde öteboyuttaki değişimi sezmiş ve önleyici bir saldırı gerçekleştirmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You close your eyes and try to {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}focus{/d}... and then you feel the touch of something sharp — Voigtvir has somehow sensed a shift in the warp and delivered a pre-emptive strike.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerini kapatıp odaklanmaya çalışıyorsun... Ama keskin bir şeyin dokunuşunu hissediyorsun. Voigtvir, bir şekilde öteboyuttaki değişimi sezmiş ve önleyici bir saldırı gerçekleştirmiş.{/n}
